main.description: Official VxNAID website - Vaccination tracking and management system

ProductOverview.Summary: VxNAID is an open-source vaccination tracking and management system designed to support immunization programs and vaccine delivery.
ProductOverview.Description: VxNAID provides tools for managing vaccination schedules, tracking vaccine inventory, monitoring coverage rates, and generating reports for immunization programs. It is designed to support both individual patient vaccination records and population-level immunization monitoring.
ProductOverview.PrimaryFunctionality: Vaccination tracking and management system for immunization programs
ProductOverview.Users: Immunization program managers, healthcare providers, public health officials, and vaccination teams

Reach.SummaryOfReach: VxNAID has been implemented in various immunization programs to support vaccination tracking and management activities.

Maturity.SummaryOfMaturity: All maturity model assessments are self-reported by the funded organization leading the development of the global good.

Community.DescriptionOfCommunity: VxNAID is developed and maintained by a global community focused on immunization and vaccination management.

HostAnchorOrganization.name: VxNAID
HostAnchorOrganization.description: Open source vaccination tracking and management system

Sustainability.Description: VxNAID is supported through open source development and community contributions.
